panels.content:
# Corona Dashboard
## Basic Information
All data is gathered from Johns Hopkins University github-respository [1] and inserted into a mariaDB with the script you can find also on github [2].\
[1] https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19 \
[2] https://github.com/targetingsnake/Covid-19-Data-for-Grafana
## Updating schedule and no-data problem
Updating-script is running at 2:00 am. For this reason, there is the possibility that that no data is shown between 5:15 am and 6:00 am in GMT+1.\
## Further Information
If you got any questions, want further information about the update script or how to import data into grafana, just mail at corona@konfuzzyus.eu.
panels.title: Information

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  country AS metric,
  cases
FROM 2020_originalData
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  country = 'Germany'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  country AS metric,
  percentage
FROM 2020_percentage1d
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  country = 'Germany'
ORDER BY date
